mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, c.*from( select camp_no as campNo, ceo_id as ceoId, camp_addr as campAddr, camp_name as campName, camp_site as campSite, camp_tel as campTel, camp_theme as campTheme, camp_fac as campFac, camp_ctg as campCtg from camp order by 1 desc)c) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}

select camp_no as campNo, ceo_id as ceoId, camp_addr as campAddr, camp_name as campName, camp_site as campSite, camp_tel as campTel, camp_theme as campTheme, camp_fac as campFac, camp_ctg as campCtg from camp where camp_no = #{campId}
